Grain.Do: Barley (1 katori), Oats (1 katori), Quinoa (1 katori), Buckwheat (1 katori). Prefer dry preparations.
Grain.Dont: Refined flour products like maida, white bread, pastries, white rice (moderation, brown rice preferred).

Legume.Do: Mung dal (1 katori), Masoor dal (1 katori), Chana dal (1 katori, well-cooked).  Sprouts in moderation.
Legume.Dont: Heavy dals like rajma, chana, urad dal (in excess), deep-fried legumes.

Veg.Do: Bitter gourd (1 katori), Leafy greens like spinach, fenugreek (1 katori), Radish (1 katori), Drumsticks (1 katori), Cauliflower (1 katori). Steamed or lightly sautéed.
Veg.Dont: Root vegetables like potatoes, sweet potatoes, carrots (in excess), yam, pumpkin, overcooked vegetables.

Spices.Do: Turmeric, Ginger, Black Pepper, Fenugreek seeds, Cumin, Coriander, Cinnamon, Cardamom. Use warm spices.
Spices.Dont: Excessive salt, sour spices like tamarind, very spicy chilies.

Leafy veg.Do: Spinach (1 katori), Fenugreek leaves (1 katori), Coriander leaves (½ katori), Mint leaves (½ katori). Lightly cooked or raw in moderation.
Leafy veg.Dont: Heavy or slimy leafy greens like okra leaves (if applicable).

Oil.Do: Mustard oil, Ghee (in moderation, 1-2 tsp). Lightly used for sautéing.
Oil.Dont: Excessive oil, fried foods, coconut oil (if prone to congestion).

Fruits.Do: Pomegranate (1 small), Apple (1 medium, cooked or stewed), Berries (½ katori), Papaya (½ katori). Warm fruits preferred.
Fruits.Dont: Sweet fruits like bananas, mangoes, figs, grapes. Cold fruits.

Milk product.Do: Buttermilk (1 glass, warm), Goat's milk (if tolerated, ½ katori). Low-fat yogurt (1 katori, warm preparation).
Milk product.Dont: Heavy milk, cheese, ice cream, excessive yogurt, cold milk.

Condiments.Do: Ginger-lemon water, warm herbal teas (e.g., fenugreek, cumin).
Condiments.Dont: Pickles, overly sour chutneys, cold drinks, sugary beverages.
